data.title: Learning Scheduler
data.description: A full stack application to provide a way to manage and schedule review sessions for whatever you are learning.

data.title: Trading Card Simulator
data.description: A simulator for opening booster packs of the popular Pokemon trading card game. Leveraged Next.js to prefetch data from a 3rd party API to improve page load performance.

data.title: Church Management System
data.description: A management system that allows users to view a directory of members, messages and join groups. Built with a team using Git.
